actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 8(e) of the National Labor Relations Act with respect to its application to labor agreements relating to construction.

summary.text: Expands certain specified unfair labor practices under the National Labor Relations Act to include agreements between a labor organization and an employer in the construction industry relating to the contracting or subcontracting of work to be done at the site of construction, alteration, painting, or repair of a building, structure, or other work.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8(e) of the National Labor Relations Act with respect to its application to labor agreements relating to construction.
